name: Ballerina Salon: Spa, Makeup & Dress Up Makeover
summary:
This is the fully unlocked version and it does not have advertisements! 

These elegant and beautiful ballerinas need to get ready for their ballet show so they can dance the night away! It's a winter ballet performance and they can't wait to go on stage at the ice theatre! They've been so focused on practising their beautiful dance routine, that they didn't have time to think about what they'll wear for the ballet show. Could you help them choose the most captivating outfits? Not just the tutus, but also the best slippers so they can perfectly perform their dance steps.

Dress them up in beautiful frost tutus so they can captivate their audience. Have fun mixing and matching slippers with ribbon laces, stockings, scarves and jewelry. There are even several holdings items to choose from, such as flowers, fans and icicles. Don't forget the headgear! Perhaps you'll give her an pretty tiara to complete her elegant and icy look.
  
Features of this game:
* Winter ballet salon theme
* 3 ballerinas to choose from: Hannah, Ava and Mia
* All your favorite sections are here: spa, makeup and dress up

How to play:
* Pick your favorite ballerina
* Help her relax before the show by treating her to a facial
* Choose the best hair and makeup for her
* Dress her up in sparkling frost tutus and accessories
* Take photos of the ballerina dancing on stage so the winter memories stay forever

If you're a ballet lover, come to experience the beauty of dance. It will be a new kind of journey: in a winter setting, complete with snowy alps, white swans and a male dance partner!
